ResearchProjectDef.label: Astra Militarum armour
ResearchProjectDef.description:
++++++ Adeptus Mechanicus Archives ++++++

[STC Fragment Λ/Φ-96]

This STC fragment contains information regarding manufacturing means of personal protection, commonly used by the Astra Militarum (Also known as the Imperial Guard) personnel. They range from lightweight flak armour, which is cheap and easy to manufacture, to heavier types, such as carapace armour, commonly used by stormtroopers and elite units.
